name: tgsearch-lambda
description: This is an AWS Lambda application consisting of a single Lambda function that is invoked whenever a new user signs up to TG-Search.

scripts.deploy: sam package --template-file template.yml --output-template-file package.yml --s3-bucket quantumsense-sam && sam deploy --template-file package.yml --stack-name tgsearch-post-signup --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
